verses.roman:
darśana nā pāñā miśra sevake puchila
rāyera vṛttānta sevaka kahite lāgila

synonyms: darśana—audience; nā—not; pāñā—getting; miśra—Pradyumna Miśra; sevake—unto the servant; puchila—inquired; rāyera—of Rāmānanda Rāya; vṛttānta—description; sevaka-the servant; kahite lāgila—began to speak.
translation: Unable to see Rāmānanda Rāya immediately, Pradyumna Miśra inquired from the servant, who then gave a description of Śrī Rāmānanda Rāya.
